content:
Pod environment variables
You can store the following environment variables in your Pods.
Variable
Description
RUNPOD_POD_ID
The unique identiﬁer for your pod.
RUNPOD_API_KEY
Used to make RunPod API calls to the speciﬁc pod. It's limited in
scope to only the pod.
RUNPOD_POD_HOSTNAME
Name of the host server the pod is running on.
RUNPOD_GPU_COUNT
Number of GPUs available to the pod.
RUNPOD_CPU_COUNT
Number of CPUs available to the pod.
RUNPOD_PUBLIC_IP
If available, the publicly accessible IP for the pod.
RUNPOD_TCP_PORT_22
The public port SSH port 22.
RUNPOD_DC_ID
The data center where the pod is located.
RUNPOD_VOLUME_ID
The ID of the volume connected to the pod.
CUDA_VERSION
The installed CUDA version.
PWD
Current working directory.
PYTORCH_VERSION
Installed PyTorch Version.
PUBLIC_KEY
The SSH public keys to access the pod over SSH.
